summary: A Multi-coloured update of my Improved Akaviri Blade
descriptionHtml:
ORIGINAL:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1750#

Well, here\'s some shiny variations of the Akaviri Blade / Dragonbane.

Turns the Akaviri Katanas either red with gold, black and silver and I updated the original sheathe to not be so bright.

At the moment, each of these is a replacement texture of the Akaviri Blade, so if anyone can help me convert these into standalone weapons, PM me!
Also, send me a message if you have anything you\'d like me to do!

Installation:
- Simply pick a colour and extract it to Skyrim/Data folder.

Please rate if you enjoyed it!
author: Gooneacehole
